message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I am currently offering it to you at a special introductory price of $8500. Please let me know if this proposition aligns with your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6000 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation. To better align with your budget while still ensuring fair compensation for our efforts and investment, I am proposing a counteroffer of $7000 for the product. This price reflects a balance between our expectations and your current offer. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6500 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I believe we can find common ground. My counteroffer is $6750 for the product. This price aims to provide a fair compromise between our respective positions, allowing you to acquire the product while still compensating us adequately for our efforts and investment.
